section.title: Fibre Channel support in Compute
section.para: Fibre Channel support in OpenStack Compute is remote block storage attached to Compute nodes for VMs.
In the Grizzly release, Fibre Channel supported only the KVM hypervisor.
Compute and Block Storage for Fibre Channel do not support automatic zoning. Fibre Channel arrays must be pre-zoned or directly attached to the KVM hosts.

section.title: KVM host requirements
section.para: You must install these packages on the KVM host:

listitem.para: sysfsutils - Nova uses the systool application in this package.
sg3-utils - Nova uses the sg_scan and sginfo applications.

section.para: Installing the multipath-tools package is optional.

section.title: Install required packages
section.para: Use these commands to install the system packages:

listitem.para: For systems running openSUSE or SUSE Linux Enterprise Server:

screen.userinput: sudo zypper install sysfsutils sg3_utils multipath-tools
sudo yum install sysfsutils sg3_utils multipath-tools
sudo apt-get install sysfsutils sg3-utils multipath-tools
